name: Camp Frost 6 Point Crampon
description: Lightweight crampons for walking on icy trails and crossing short section of snow or ice. They don't have front point, so they are not designed for climbing.Made of chromoly steel that stands up to rock and ice, and won't wear rapidly like aluminum.6-point design provides excellent under-foot traction.Fits into boot instep and heel.Width adjustment in front and back for fitting a variety of boots.Includes a carrying case.
